name: BFGoodrich All-Terrain T/A KO2
short: Durable all-terrain tyres for mixed road and rugged trails. Excellent tread life and tough sidewalls.
description: The legendary BFGoodrich All-Terrain tyres deliver serious offroad performance and reliability. Our fitment service includes professional mounting, balancing, and wheel alignment to ensure your vehicle is ready for any Zambian adventure.

name: Heavy-Duty Steel Rear Bumper
short: Custom-fabricated steel bumper with integrated recovery points and tow hitch receiver.
description: Protect your vehicle and enhance its capability with a custom heavy-duty steel rear bumper. Each bumper is precision-engineered, powder-coated for durability, and fitted with robust D-shackle mounts for confident recovery operations.

name: 2-Inch Suspension Lift Kit
short: Complete lift kit with performance shocks, professional alignment, and a full safety check.
description: Gain ground clearance and improve off-road articulation with a 2-inch lift kit, expertly installed by our team. The package includes performance shocks, springs, and a comprehensive suspension alignment and tuning for optimal handling on and off the road.
